item.title: Submit Completed Class Project
item.description: Grading Rubric for second parallelization method Choice of portion of code to parallelize (1 point) Choice of approach for parallelizing code (1 point) Code performs proposed tasks (2 point) Unit/regression tests comparing serial & parallel versions (1 point) Code passes tests (1 point) General code efficiency (1 point) Implementation/optimization of second type of parallelism (2 points) Significant performance improvement (1 point)
